text: aur (ai rasool) agar tum usase poochho ki kisane aasamaan se paanee barasaaya phir usake zariye se zameen ko isake marane (paratee hone) ke baad zinda (aabaad) kiya to vah zarur yahee kahenge ki allaah ne (ai rasool) tum kah do alham do lillaah-magar uname se bahutere (itana bhee) nahin samajhate
